title: Jesus Christ Teaches about the Temple
short_title: Jesus Christ Teaches about the Temple
content: Illustrations by Bradley Clark and Paul Mann
In Nauvoo, the Prophet Joseph Smith received important revelations from Jesus Christ.
He learned that people could be baptized in the temple for those who had died. Before this, people thought that those who died without being baptized could not go to heaven.
The Saints rejoiced. Now they knew that their loved ones could go to heaven!
